ingredients: 15 scallions, trimmed from white to green about 6 inches long, then halved crosswise, preferably texas scallions
1 pound small red or yukon gold potatoes, halved or quartered, depending on size
1/2 pound  (227 grams) peeled baby carrots, about 17
2 ¼ cups (227 grams) sugar snap peas
1 ¾ cups (113 grams) snow peas, trimmed
1 ¾ cups (227 grams) fresh (or frozen) baby green peas
1 pint red and/or yellow cherry tomatoes (291 grams)
2 cups roasted vegetable broth or chicken broth, homemade or commercial low-sodium
½ cup (43 grams) freshly grated Parmesan cheese, optional, Parmigiano Reggiano preferred
